branchCategory.name: Wide Opening - MHL
branchCategory.description: <p>Gripper series MHL2 is designed for applications that require a wide range of travel for gripping many different sized workpieces.&nbsp; The MHL2 finger motion is synchronized by a rack-and-pinion mechanism. The double piston construction creates a compact gripper with a large holding force. Vacuum ports, copper fluorine and silicon free options available.</p>

branchItem.name: MHL2, Air Gripper, Parallel Style, Wide Opening
branchItem.description: Designed for applications that require a wide range of travel for gripping many different sized workpieces; the MHL2 Series finger motion is synchronized by a rack-and-pinion mechanism. The double piston construction creates a compact gripper with a large holding force.

branchItem.name: MHL2-Z, Air Gripper, Parallel Style, Wide Opening
branchItem.description: <p>The MHL2-Z is designed for applications that require a wide range of travel for gripping many different sized work pieces; the updated MHL2 Series finger motion is synchronized by a rack-and-pinion mechanism.  The double construction creates a compact gripper with a large holding force.</p>

branchItem.name: 11/22-MHL2, Parallel Style Wide Opening Air Gripper, Clean Series
branchItem.description: Designed for applications that require a wide range of travel for gripping many different sized workpieces in clean room environments. The MHL2 Series finger motion is synchronized by a rack-and-pinion mechanism. The double piston construction creates a compact gripper with a large holding force. Vacuum ports, copper fluorine and silicon free options available.
